cryptoTrader.utils  

  • Uses of CryptoCoinList in cryptoTrader.utils

    Methods in cryptoTrader.utils that return CryptoCoinList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    CryptoCoinList TradingBroker.getCoinList()
    This method will return the list of cryptos being used by the broker
    CryptoCoinList Operation.getCoins()
    This method returns the coin list which holds all the used coins for each particular trade
